title: Zucchini Pineapple Bread Recipe
full_text:
Zucchini Pineapple Bread Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Cook
60 mins
Active
15 mins
Cooling Time
70 mins
Total
2 hrs 15 mins
Serves
8
to 10 servings
Makes
1 loaf
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
tablespoon
softened
unsalted butter
1 1/2
cups
(
7 1/2
ounces
)
all-purpose flour
1
teaspoon
baking soda
1/4
teaspoon
baking powder
1/4
teaspoon
ground cinnamon
3/4
cup
sugar
1/2
cup
vegetable oil
2
eggs
, beaten
1/2
teaspoon
vanilla extract
1
cup
(about
1
medium
)
grated zucchini
1/2
cup
crushed pineapple
, drained
1/2
cup
chopped walnuts
Directions
Adjust oven rack to middle position and preheat to 350° F. Butter an 8- by 4-inch loaf pan and set aside.
In a large bowl whisk together flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon and sugar. In a separate bowl combine vegetable oil, vanilla extract, zucchini and pineapple and mix with a wooded spoon until well combined.
Mix together wet and dry ingredients and scrape into prepared loaf pan. Bake until thin knife inserted into center of bread comes out clean, about 1 hour. Allow to cool for 10 minutes in loaf pan, then remove from pan and place on a rack to cool completely. Slice and serve.
Special Equipment
8- by 4-inch loaf pan
Quick Breads
Pineapple
Zucchini & Yellow Squash
